YOGA, ROLLING & FLEXIBILTY FOR RUNNERS (ATHLETES) 
 
 
 
 Strengthen your muscles, loosen your joints, and relax your body and mind with this?yoga?workshops which is specifically designed for runners (athletes).?Reduce stress, aches & pains in the body associated with tightness from running. Improve your flexibility and prevent injury?specifically for runners, cyclists and athletes.? 
 Too many runners (cyclists and athletes) suffer from bad backs and knees, often forcing them to abandon running altogether. This?workshop?will directly addresses the common physical complications that arise, keeping you injury-free and running for many years to come. 
 
 
 WHAT YOU WILL LEARN 
 
 Rebalancing the body, most injuries are caused by imbalances and overuse (repetitive movement such as running & spinning) 
 Improving flexibility in targeted areas in the body; hamstrings, hips, calves, IT bands, groins and upper back which are the most common issues 
 Self-massage/rolling with yoga balls. ?It targets areas of the body much better then the typical foam roller can.
